author: XL-Seb-Yan
body:
#### PR description:

Added a check to check the validity of the electron gsfTrack before accessing it. Without this check, the code would crash if the electron does not have a valid gsfTrack

#### PR validation:

scram b runtests, pass
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos, pass
title: Fixbug HLTDoubletDZ filter
